page.title: 14CRANTOCK FEAST DAY
page.content: On{Crantock Feast Day}everyone meets in the Village Hall. The band from the neighbouring village of St. Newlyn East plays during the afternoon while there are all sorts of competitions going on, such as 'Glamorous Granny' and 'Fancy Dress'. All afternoon there are races for different age groups - especially children. There is a Feast Tea, 4.15 pm, a Slide Show at 7.30 pm with pictures of Crantock & Newquay and supper is at 9.00. Prize Bingo is played at 9.30 followed by entertainment from Rod & Jane, who are singers. {Crantock Parish Church} was seriously damaged by fire and later restored so in May the villagers held a Concert of Thanks in the Church. The Newquay Male Voice Choir came along to sing.
